task.title: Apply a Demo ID of QueueMetrics
task.shortdesc: The QueueMetrics Integration App provides 30-days free trial. You can apply a demo ID of QueueMetrics on the PBX, and test the integration by the demo ID.

p.note: You can apply only one demo ID of QueueMetrics on one PBX.

step.cmd: Log in the PBX web interface, go to QueueMetrics Integration.
Choose the call center type to QueueMetrics Live.
Click I wanna create a QueueMetrics ID.
Enter your desired ID, password and other information.

step.stepresult: The PBX will send you an email to activate your QueueMetrics Live ID.
